title: TTC Audio - Athenian Democracy an Experiment for the Ages
description: TTC Audio - Athenian Democracy for the Ages MP3 64 kbps + Guidebook Course Lecture Titles 24 Lectures 32 minutes / lecture 01. Why Athenian Democracy Matters 02. The Origins of Greek Democracy 03. Solon - The Father of Democracy 04. Cleisthenes the Innovator 05. The Nearly Bloodless Coup 06. Democracy at War 07. The Popular Assembly 08. The Council and the Magistrates 09. The Citizens of Athens 10. “The Empire You Hold Is a Tyranny” 11. The Age of Pericles 12. Public Speaking in Athens 13. Pericles’s Funeral Speech 14. Democracy under Duress 15. The Culture of Athenian Democracy 16. Political Leadership in Athens 17. The Brutality of Athenian Democracy 18. Athenian Defeat in Sicily 19. Suspension, Restoration, and Termination 20. The Democratic Theater 21. Law and Order under Democracy 22. Ancient Critics of Athenian Democracy 23. Post-Athenian Democracies 24. Democracy Today, Democracy Tomorrow https://www.thegreatcourses.com/courses/athenian-democracy-an-experiment-for-the-ages.html
